dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on the performance of Age of Information (AoI) in wireless networks, analyzing how to keep data fresh through optimal update strategies.
dcterms:title: Age of Information (AoI) performance in wireless networks

dcterms:description: This dataset explores the application of Intelligent Reflecting Surfaces (IRS) for minimizing Age of Information (AoI) in wireless communications.
dcterms:title: Intelligent Reflecting Surfaces (IRS) application for AoI minimization

dcterms:creator: Z. Bao

Z. Chen
P. Fan
K. B. Letaief
dcterms:description: This dataset addresses age-optimal service and decision processes in the Internet of Things (IoT), focusing on minimizing Age of Information.
dcterms:title: Age-optimal service and decision processes in IoT

dcterms:creator: C. Xu
Y. Xie
X. Wang
H. H. Yang
D. Niyato
T. Q. S. Quek
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on optimal status updates for caching enabled IoT networks, utilizing a dueling deep reinforcement network approach.
dcterms:title: Optimal status update for caching enabled IoT networks

dcterms:creator: C. Zhou
G. Li
J. Li
Q. Zhou

dcterms:description: This dataset presents a freshness-aware scheduling solution via reinforcement learning for latency-sensitive applications.
dcterms:title: Freshness-aware scheduling via reinforcement learning

dcterms:creator: E. T. Ceran
D. Gündüz
A. György
dcterms:description: This dataset explores a reinforcement learning approach to manage Age of Information in multi-user networks with Hybrid Automatic Repeat reQuest (HARQ).
dcterms:title: A reinforcement learning approach to age of information in multi-user networks

dcterms:creator: B.-M. Robaglia
A. Destounis
M. Coupechoux
D. Tsilimantos
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on deep reinforcement learning for scheduling uplink IoT traffic with strict deadlines.
dcterms:title: Deep reinforcement learning for scheduling uplink IoT traffic

dcterms:description: This dataset addresses the optimization of Age of Information in a Reconfigurable Intelligent Surface (RIS)-assisted wireless network.

dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on optimizing Age of Information through aerial reconfigurable intelligent surfaces using a deep reinforcement learning approach.
